channel.title: General on My Flatiron Journey
channel.description: Recent content in General on My Flatiron Journey

item.title: My Learning Hacks
item.description: So I wanted to share the hacks that I’m using to upgrade my life some and increase my mental aptitude to crushing this curriculum. There is a certain amount of mental stamina that has to be maintained on a day to day basis to keep up this pace. So… here’s my brain upgrades/biohacks/etc… that keep my moving tip top while doing this bootcamp full time and taking care of kids full time.

item.title: Before I Start Flatiron
item.description: There were a few things I had to get out of the way before I started Flatiron. First, I needed a solid schedule I was going to follow. I didn’t want to take 8 months to finish the program. In fact, I couldn’t take 8 months to finish the program as my expenses were too much to stretch that long. I also wanted to minimize my family’s child care expenses so I came up with a solid schedule:
